citations.narrative:
*** There are two enclosures where the wood beams at the top of the enclosure are excessively chewed and splintered.
These same enclosures have paint flaking off the metal doors which is exposing some rust on the door. The chewed
wood and rusted area of the door are no longer impervious to moisture. These surfaces must be maintained in good
repair or replaced when needed so that surfaces in contact with the dogs are able to be readily cleaned and sanitized.
Correct by: May 30, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
*** There are two enclosures where the wood beams at the top of the enclosure are excessively chewed and splintered. 
These same enclosures have paint flaking off the metal doors which is exposing some rust on the door. The chewed 
wood and rusted area of the door are no longer impervious to moisture. These surfaces must be maintained in good 
repair or replaced when needed so that surfaces in contact with the dogs are able to be readily cleaned and sanitized. 
Correct by: May 30, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
